summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4616 for the improvement of 4th Avenue South (west side) from Seattle Boulevard to Spokane Street; and certain parts of certain streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53702, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
